front.title: IEEE Approved Draft Standard for Exchanging Information between Networks Implementing IEC 61850 and IEEE Std 1815(TM) (Distributed Network Protocol

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: The editing instructions for this corrigendum are to insert a diagram as Figure 52 in the place where it is 19 currently missing from the approved but unpublished document in Clause 8.11.6.1.6 (NOTE: This corrigendum was not published as a separate document, but was incorporated in IEEE Std 1815.1-2015)
